column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Had never tried deep dish pizza before Lou's
column2: but now I'm wondering why every city hasn't adopted this trend. Sure
column3: you have to wait 30 minutes until you can ingest this oozing pie of deliciousness
column4: but it's well worth the wait. My friend and I shared the fried calamari and the veggie pizza. Both were excellent.
